name: Golden Rush - Barbarian's Full Set of Artifacts
detailed_description:
Barbarian's Full Set of Artifacts: legendary armor and weapon for those who prefer Barbarian's brutal force. Ensure your superiority! The package offers a choice of one of three level 1 sets.

Choose one of the three Legendary sets:
  • Rebel set (unlocks the additional skill "Banner of resistance");
  • Berserker set (unlocks the additional skill "Vengeance");
  • Executioner set (unlocks the additional skill "Death Mark").

Each set includes:
  • Armor;
  • Helmet;
  • Boots;
  • Axe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Celeron E3200 / Athlon X2 6550
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 6800 / ATI X1800 / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
